entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support registering all runtime signal handlers with `SA_ONSTACK` #110368
    Future
  • Missing documentation for BindingFlags.DoNotWrapExceptions #110366
  • C++/CLI __declspec(appdomain) static variables cause a C++/CLI binary to fail to load. #110365
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Customized date formatting for SmtpClient #110361
    Future
  • MethodInfo.CreateDelegate() creates working delegate but delegate.Method throws #110357
  • ServiceController constructor throws exception with Nuget library 9.0 in .NET6 #110354
    10.0.0
  • Consider adding a telemetry event for failed HTTP connection attempts #110351
  • Process not responsive dump indicates garbage collection #110350
  • SerialPort.ParityReplace not working on Linux #110349
  • Named mutex not working on Linux and MacOS when AOT compiling #110348
  • Assertion failed '!inTry || ((unsigned)(add->acdTryIndex - 1) != XTnum)' during 'Remove empty finally 2' #110346

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add API to enable BackgroundService startup to avoid blocking host startup #36063
    10.0.0
  • Enhance JsonConsoleFormatter to be configurable and avoid to duplicate information #110373
  • Segmentation Fault in libcoreclr Since .Net 8 Upgrade #99151
    Future
  • Deserialize of DateOnly in System.Text.Json 9.0.0 returns incorrect date and year #109892
  • The mask of `shiftAmount` in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 instead of 31 #103506
    10.0.0
  • Reconsider deleting `linux-instructions.md` and related files #110324
    10.0.0
  • Contract-based polymorphic support only sometimes works, depending on casting #109502
  • Loop goes in wrong direction #100825
    10.0.0
  • Publish Failure in .NET 9 RC 2 for Blazor Web App (.NET 8, Auto Render Mode) and Blazor WASM (.NET 8) with Localization #109604
    8.0.x
  • MeterListener can't listen to RuntimeMetrics #110252
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'newLclValue.BothDefined()' during 'Do value numbering' #110306
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `bool TryGetElementAt<T>(this IEnumerable<T>, out T element)` #110338

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix recursion issue found in issue #109779 #110379
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Install zlib in the IlcFrameworkNative folder instead of alongside the runtime #110378
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110377
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [Profiler] Cleanup profiler logic #110376
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Profiler][Docs] Cleanup Profiler Pinning documentation #110375
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix ACD updates when a non-enclosing EH region is removed #110374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110372
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Fix C++/CLI applications which use __declspec(appdomain) #110367
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix zlib-ng build with cmake 3.31.0 #110359
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Enable more ILLinker skipped tests on native AOT #110353
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Enhance IV opts relop evaluation to use range check #110352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the bug within ‘RtlpUnwindFunctionFull()’ when dealing with the ‘end_c’ unwind code. #110347
    community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, needs-area-label
  • Move GetRefAny (with FCThrow) to managed #110344
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ECMA augments regarding instance and type construction. #110343
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • Delete System.Array special case in TryResolveTypeNameForCreateInstanceAndMark #110345
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Do greedy 4-opt for backward jumps in 3-opt layout #110277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • [manual] Merge release/9.0-staging into release/9.0 #110370
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [Release/8.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109579
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Disable transitions test under GC Stress #109986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #110228
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Update Azure Linux tag names #110341
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0-staging] Suppress IL3050 warnings in ILLink tests #110340
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix Workflow Broken Markdown Links #110332
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • Fix increment in decreasing loop in non-shipping code #110219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable more ILLink test cases with native AOT #110166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid mask<->vector optimization for masks used in unhandled ways #110307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `GetHardwareIntrinsicId` on 32bit platforms #110238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Simplify usage of the installer and shared framework SDKs based on improvements in the tooling #109710
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Only build cdac-build-tool when we need to build runtime #109719
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable cloning of try regions #110020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan (Try 2) #109707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix analyzer tracking of nullable enums #110331
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2594336 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove .NET Framework-era remoteable wait subsystem #109754
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Help finding Brotli headers when doing VMR build under FreeBSD #110079
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • JIT_CountProfile: Avoid BSR instruction for low counts #110258
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109783
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109782
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110334
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Always aggressively compact blocks #109521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Warn on method access in Requires analyzers #110086
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #110163
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Warn on message formatting failure instead of crash, and fix Native AOT MakeGenericType failure #110330
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix Configuration to throw with ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration option #110209
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host
  • JIT: Allow strength reducing to GCD of IVs #110222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add vector support to System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives.LeadingZeroCount for Byte and Int16 #110333
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110058
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • Check loaded in dac values to avoid SIGSEGV on null pointers #110303
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110268
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110269
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110271
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add support for emitting Source Link data #110270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Trim-compatible bindings #2853
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] AOT-compatible runtime features #2852
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Memory ownership #2851
  • [Swift shipping] Implement testing framework #2850
  • [Swift shipping] Implement tooling/bindings distribution using NuGet packages #2849
  • [Projection tooling] Design overall architecture of the projection tooling #2846
  • [Projection tooling] Implement ABI/MachO parser #2845
  • [Projection tooling] Implement demangler #2844
  • [Projection tooling] Implement bindings emitter: String-based / model-based #2843
  • [Projection tooling] Implement Swift type registrar #2842
  • [Swift runtime features] Implement Swift existential containers #2841
  • [Swift runtime features] Implement Swift witness tables #2840
  • [Swift runtime features] Implement Swift conformance descriptors #2839
  • [Swift runtime features] Implement Swift metadata #2838
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift wrappers for async #2837
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift wrappers for enums #2836
  • [Swift language features] Implement Any / Some in C# #2835
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift.Set in C# #2834
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift.Array in C# #2833
  • [Swift language features] Implement unsafe pointers in C# #2832
  • [Swift language features] Implement Foundation.String in C# #2831
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift primitive types in C# #2830
  • [Swift language features] Implement common interfaces in projections (IEnumerable, ICollection, IDisposable) #2829
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift closures in C# #2828
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift static methods in C# #2827
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift instance methods in C# #2826
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift initializers in C# #2825
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift protocols in C# #2824
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift enums in C# #2823
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift structs in C# #2822

Closed

  • Review projection tooling UX and functionality #2582
  • [SwiftBindings] Add value witness table support #2800

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add an option to select the LLVM checkout path #2848
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [RuntimeAsync] Fix support for pinvokes #2847
    area-async

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Type database typos #2821
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Add Type Database documentation #2820
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Added support for size, stride, alignment, and the value witness table #2813
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift bindings] Add Swift code generation doc #2816
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [RuntimeAsync] Switch the implementation to the new shape of runtime async methods. #2818
    area-async

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve Reflection Handling with PublishTrimmed in .NET 9.0 #45284
  • Template Engine Tests Fail on NET 10 for Listing Templates #45283
  • Compile dotnet on mac and start the subprogram through TestFlight #45268
  • Regression from .NET 8: `dotnet run` on .NET 9 emits ANSI terminal codes when redirected #45262

Closed

  • MSIX packaging for arbitrary .NET project types #45045
  • dotnet format: "The build host could not be found" after updating VS to .NET SDK 9 #44893

PullRequests

Created

  • [backport][dotnet-format] Include the .NET Framework buildhost executable in the SDK. #45291
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-format] Include the .NET Framework buildhost executable in the SDK. #45290
    untriaged, Area-Format
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.101 December 2024 Updates #45289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Draft of guidelines for managing various kinds of breaking changes in the SDK #45288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX MAIN] Update the tests to reflect the new templates. #45287
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Force overwriting packs in FileBasedInstaller when repairing Fixes #31282 #45286
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • VMR: Add Windows x86 DevVersions leg #45285
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix(cli): dotnet help new link opening #45282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump MSTest templates to 3.6.4 #45278
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-DotNet Test
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24602.1 #45277
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Temporarily disable tests on AzureLinux_x64_Cross_Mono #45276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #45263
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Don't publish PrivateAssets Fixes #39400 #45259
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Log the build output when the repo build is successful but a manifest… #45281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update image to centos-stream9 #45250
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-Templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Review for breaking changes, breaking-change, Area-CLI, Area-VS, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add .json to editorconfig #45227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use arcade infra for DEB and RPM build #45047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better search versions error experience #45144
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45159
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Pass missing compiler parameters #45257
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #45252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add integration tests for dotnet test scenarios #45138
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: `readonly` parameters #8716
  • [Proposal]: First-Class Span Types #8714
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Associated Types #8712
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Nominal and Collection Deconstruction #8708
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Tuple Specification] numerous additions needed for discards and deconstruction #3197
  • [Tuple Specification] Define "tuple element" #3196
  • [Tuple Specification] Make a statement about the purpose of element names. #3195
  • [Tuple Specification] Tuple equality and point releases #3193
  • [Tuple specification] Swap trick assignment definition isn't an lvalue #3188
  • [Tuple specification] Grammar doesn't allow some legal initialization #3187
  • [Tuple Specification] tuple element names in overridden signatures #3154
  • [Tuple specification] Tuple Literals/Tuple Expressions #3186
  • [Tuple Specification] deconstruct method rules #3185
  • [Tuple Specification] deconstruction assignment syntax must be defined #3184
  • [Tuple specification] The term "exact match" rule is not defined #3183
  • [Tuple specification] define how tuple syntax maps to `System.ValueTuple`. #3182
  • [Tuple specification] "discard" needs to be defined. #3181
  • [Tuple Specification] member wise conversion and tuple type conversion #3156
  • [Tuple Specification] instance conversion, extension method invocation #3155
  • [Proposal]: Allow `var` variables to be used in a `nameof` in their initializers #4384
    Likely Never
  • [Tuple Specification] Specify how tuple member names affect lookup rules #3153
  • Proposal: Attributes everywhere #2478
  • [Tuple specification] Specify grammar rules for `new` #3152
  • Proposal: Immutable Types #2543
  • [Tuple Specification] Tuple duality with the underlying type. #3151
  • `in` usable as `ref` in older compiler versions causes source break if recompiled with v7.2 #1308
  • Proposal: Support catch and finally for using #2018
  • Proposal: syntactic sugar for initializing Span<char> by stackalloc with string literal #1947
  • A design for nullable opt-in #1939
  • Proposal: Stack-allocated closures #1862
  • Proposal: Add support for code examples in metadata documentations #1835
  • [Performance] Proposal - aligned `new` and `stackalloc` with `alignas(x)` for arrays of primitive types and less primitive as well #1799
  • Proposal: Allow <see> tag to display custom string. #1781
  • Annotated Text for C# and VB #1775
  • [Proposal] Local functions for properties that are shared between the getter and setter #1686
  • Idea : Property References #1677
  • operator overloading for type-closed generic class #1668
  • Generic constraint `where T : readonly struct` #1620
  • [Proposal] Object Initializer support for events #1552
  • Allow 'ref readonly struct' for 'readonly ref struct' #1536
  • Operator on tuple #1514
  • [Proposal] Add sizeof(T) support for unmanaged constraint #1508
  • Proposal: allow explicitlty declaring blittable structs as unmanaged #1495
  • Allow operator overloading with "out" for the result #1477
  • Allow using block to dispose Tuple contains some object with Dispose #1473
  • Language proposal: DSL-like method invokes and custom code blocks wrappers #1457
  • Update several properties of a single object #1449
  • Proposal: pattern matching of states #1431
  • Proposal: Implicit cast from property expression to get/set delegate? #1385
  • Proposal: Skeleton Classes #1374
  • Allow names of tuple values in method return type to be based on input tuple value names #1357
  • Proposal: Rethrow Expressions #1340
  • Proposal: Disjunction types or type expressions on generic type constraints #1310
  • Proposal: Analog for enums containing multiple options and bitwise operations with them #1303
  • Discussion: Allow omission of parens and requiring block #1090
  • Proposal: Struct Lambdas #1060
  • Allow `var` use with optional arguments. #1056
  • Local function expressions #960
  • IL-specific C# implementation spec #897
  • [Proposal] Expand const keyword usage to enable compile time enforcement of const semantics #744
  • [Proposal]: Provide a way to annotate methods that will always throw. #739
  • Spec clarification for scope of `#pragma warning disable` #710
  • Proposal: Fix generic methods when using out parameters #630
  • Proposal: ref property with both ref getter and setter #607
  • Proposal: auto-property with ref getter #606
  • Proposal: Nested `enum` with implicit conversion #587
  • Proposal/Discussion: Negation of if/while Condition #568
  • Poll: `until` in addition to `while` #562
  • Proposal: Allow setting readonly fields to null in Dispose #542
  • Proposal Generic cast operator #534
  • Expression-bodied property set notation could be further simplified #528
  • Null-conditional operator `??` not allowed in generics unless constraint with `class` #505
  • using an empty namespace in a different assembly does not produce a helpfull error message #498
  • Proposal: in-set and in-range operator to ease checking of value within a pre-defined set #420
  • Proposal: Type aliases / abbreviations / newtype #410
  • Discussion : Omitting new keyword #350
  • Championed: Non-defaultable value types #146
  • [Proposal] Forcing ConfigureAwait(false) on assembly level #2542
  • Proposal: add an F-bound or CRTP (CRGP?) constraint for generic type parameters #2495
  • Proposal: support "type of the current object" as declared return type. #2494
  • [Proposal]: `readonly` parameters #8478
  • Proposal: "Opaque" parameters #4629
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: First-Class Span Types #7905
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Existential types for interfaces and abstract types #1328
  • [Proposal]: Practical existential types for interfaces #5556
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Nominal and Collection Deconstruction #4082
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add syntax for extensions #8695
  • Update simple-lambda-parameters-with-modifiers.md #8703
  • Update experimental-attribute.md with information for Message property #8694
  • Updates for week of Dec 2 #8705

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Outlining #76248
  • Area - Remove Unused Member #76247
  • Area - Simplify Interpolation #76246
  • Area - Toggle Comment #76245
  • Area - Order Modifiers #76244
  • Area - Workspace Public APIs #76243
  • Text Editor does not Center when I select a Method in Document Outline Window #76242
  • Parameter Info stops working after pressing Ctrl+Shift+Space in a particular function call #76241
  • Test plan for "string literals in data section as utf8" #76234
    .NET 10
  • C# Methods are not colored #76232

Closed

  • Region position bug for #if & #elif #58895
    Backlog
  • List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first case of a switch expression #72196
    Backlog
  • CSharpDecompiledSourceService.PerformDecompilation may throw FileNotFoundException #45801
    Backlog
  • Avoid unnecessary casts when refactoring #39116
    Backlog
  • C#: Naming rule violation with camelCase formatting applied will conflict with static void Main() method inside classes. #36385
    Backlog
  • Cref: constructor overload parameter list differences are disregarded in VB #34104
    Backlog
  • Display the analyzers and extensions causing "Gathering suggestions" to block #29530
    Backlog
  • Introduce Local: multiple unnecessary casts generated and also not grayed out #24853
    Backlog
  • Avoid using Document snapshot in perf-sensitive command handlers #57554
    Backlog
  • CTRL + click (and F12) on a partial property should always jump to user-defined part #76156
  • "Go to Definition" crashes with `BadImageFormatException` for `System.Net.IPEndPoint` #75118
    17.13
  • Implement interfaces code fix does not implement protected interface members non-explicitly #72380
    Backlog
  • "Implement abstract class" should add the right generic constraint when a parameter is covariant in T? and constrained to be a subtype #71225
    Backlog
  • Extract Interface / Pull Up should remove [Enumeratorancellation] attributes #71718
    Backlog
  • "Extract Interface" refactoring doesn't offer to add static members to the interface #54019
    Backlog
  • Refactoring ""Extract Method" when a primary constructor property is in the extracted code sends primary constructor property in as a method parameter #73580
    Backlog
  • The "Extract method" refactoring should recognize primary constructor parameters #73044
    Backlog
  • Find All References does not support using statements #34107
    Backlog
  • Find all references to `dynamic` does not work #75800
    17.13
  • Find All References finds nothing for indexers declared outside the solution #31819
    Backlog
  • csharp_style_var_when_type_is_apparent breaks when awaiting a generic type #64902
    Backlog
  • CS4033 creates invalid code on partial methods #63404
    Backlog
  • Clone of Test_IndexerWithNoRequiredParameters for params collections fails #72227
    Backlog
  • Introduce local variable gets nullability wrong #69335
    Backlog
  • Make "Introduce a local variable" work with top-level statements #67270
    Backlog
  • Introduce local mangles formatting #47277
    Backlog
  • ExtractLocal crash when fixing all #23297
    Backlog
  • 'Introduce local for x' changes code and introduces errors #25838
    Backlog
  • CodeLens popup is empty 17.6.2 #68548
  • `Replace 'Property' with method` erases DIM #75999
    Backlog
  • Summary Xml-Doc actively breaks code #75838
    17.13
  • `Use language keywords` does not work for `nint` and `nuint` when targeting `net4.8.1` using `LangVersion` 9.0 or higher #74973
    Backlog
  • Replace 'xxx' with method has bug #75186
    17.13
  • IDE0078: Code Cleanup applied IDE0078 and broke the code #75122
    17.13
  • Clone of UnwrapParamsArray fpr params collections #72225
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip CSharpWinForms.DeleteControl on 32 bit release #76239
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix go-to-def on an abstract explicit impl of an interface method #76238
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Check ref safety of arg mixing in collection initializers #76237
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add Color Scheme support for VS 2022 tinted themes. #76233
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Don't place 'async' after 'partial' modifier #76168
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support static members in extract interface #76151
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update FAR and Go to Def to work on indexers #76220
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix NFW thrown when refreshing source generated files #76240
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Keep member bodies when converting DIM property to method #76186
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use new championed proposal and test plan for "extensions" feature #76131
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - Extension Everything, Next
  • Fix override implementation with generics and constraints #76223
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update find-refs to find references to Dispose in a using-statement #76221
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix equivalence check for nint/IntPtr #76231
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add support for 'find refs' finding references to 'dynamic' #76118
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, VSCode, Next
  • Support implementing protected members in implement interface #76178
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • VBOverloadResolutionPriority: clone remaining C# tests for the feature #76127
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Do not treat Task.Run methods as 'apparent' for 'use var' #76229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support introduce variable at the top level #76218
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix switch indentation for list patterns #75953
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix incorrect codespit of xml doc comments #76108
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support nint/intptr conversion on c# 11 and up #76181
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Have go-to-def flip between partial definition and implementation #76187
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update Copilot rename telemetry #76045
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Do not duplicate directives when converting from property to methods #76184
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Catch expected exception when reading info out of a PDB #76182
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • fix flaky lsp diagnostic test #76228
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable 'use pattern matching' when eliding multiple calls that pass by ref #76183
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not pass primary constructor parameters explicit when extracting methods #76179
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update suggestion mode provider to support params collections #76177
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Filter out certain compiler attributes when extracting an interface #76176
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Onboard C# advanced pages to unified settings #75493
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move off of specialized task methods #76149
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Restrict some types in object initializer setters when not directly settable #75507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix primary ctor param in static context #74580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Threading fixes #76230
    Area-Compilers
  • Update the Copilot powered Inline Rename UX #76001
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve parsing recovery with 'file' keyword #76185
    Area-Compilers, Feature - File-Local Types, VSCode
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • avoid ITextSnapshotLine.GetText() #76133
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930

  • Add feature flag for emitting string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036

  • Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050

  • Fix issue where structure tag could get stuck at the wrong location #76194

entry.content:

Closed

  • [SignalR] Connection fails to consume ping messages leading to disconnect #58623

  • What does this mean and how can it be resolved properly? Package 'Microsoft.AspNet.Mvc 5.2.8' was restored using '...' instead of the project target framework 'net8.0'. This package may not be fully compatible with your project. #59220

Created

Merged

    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Set DefaultAppHostRuntimeIdentifier when building the product (i.e. i… #59286
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    area-infrastructure
  • [Infrastructure] Update Selenium versions #59268
    area-infrastructure
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • React to deps.json change wrt PrivateAssets #35265
    10.0.0
  • How do I handle: The Azure Cosmos DB provider for EF Core currently does not support index definitions.' #35264
  • User transaction is not supported with a TransactionSuppressed migrations or a retrying execution strategy Ef core 9 #35263
  • Different behaviour between `Include` and `ThenInclude` when querying self-referencing entities #35262
  • Rename EntityTypeBuilder<TEntity>.HasData(params object[] data) overload #35261
  • How to avoid 'N' being prepended before json path in json_value() function in a user-defined function #35260
  • Why are owned types required to use ToJson feature? #35259
  • Issues with EF Tools (9.0.0) and MS.CodeAnalysis.WorkSpaces.MSBuild (4.8.0) #35258

Closed

  • Support for a Single Project with Multiple Provider Migrations - Edge Case/Issue/Request #34197
  • Regression going from .NET/EF 8 to 9 with CosmosDb, will no longer save/load Ulid and Custom struct types #34936
  • The data types varchar and nvarchar are incompatible in the '^' operator #35093
    9.0.1
  • EF Core 9 : the database operation was expected to affect 1 row(s), but actually affected 0 row(s) #35195

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Don't suppress transactions when creating the history repository #35266
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Expose SQLite VFS option in connection string #34864

Updated

  • Don't attempt to remove a detached entry from the local view #35253
  • Don't escape separator characters in single key values #35252
  • Adding Half type support for SqlLite #35193
